name: Luna Lovegood
opinion: This lamp is so good. I was looking for this lamp since 2 years and got one few days ago. I would like to recommend everyone to buy NECK-BEND-LAMP.

name: Harry Potter
opinion: I am very disappointed after buying this lamp. The service is very bad. The battery backup is also bad. I had to cast the lumos spell for whole night. I wouldn't like to tell anyone to buy ORGANIC-TABLE-LAMP.

name: Severus Snape
opinion: Very much amused after using this CLASSIC-DESK-LAMP. Impressive battery backup and very soft light. I guess it also protects my eyes.

name: Hermione Granger
opinion: Honestly guys, this FLOWER-COATED-LAMP is making me crazy. Like i am having the 1000 cd as the luminous intensity which is helping me to use the full 576 mega pixel of my eyes. I wish I could gift everyone this lamp.

name: Ronald Weasley
opinion: An average qualityful Lamp. Neither bad nor good. Anyone can have the POLAR-TABLE-LAMP if they want.

name: Lord Voldemort
opinion: Well, I might not say that buying CLOUDY-BODY-LAMP is a bad choice. The outlook is good but one thing I am always conscious about is the performance. And yet I am satisfy with the performance.

name: Albus Dumbledore
opinion: Happiness can be found, even in the darkest of times, if one only remembers to turn on the light. FLAT-HEADED-LAMP always reminds me that line. Yes, I am very much satisfied with the service.

name: Draco Malfoy
opinion: STAIRCASED-LAMP is one of the beauty I have ever used. I will always use this lamp. And my father will definitely hear about this and he will also buy it.

name: Remus Lupin
opinion: This lamp always reminds me of moon lit night. It is a great pleasure for me to enjoy the moon light while I am in my room. The service is also very satisfying.
